resp = client.ml.infer_trained_model(
    model_id="model2",
    docs=[
        {
            "text_field": "This is a very happy person"
        }
    ],
    inference_config={
        "zero_shot_classification": {
            "labels": [
                "glad",
                "sad",
                "bad",
                "rad"
            ],
            "multi_label": False
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
